chart_metadata.name: photoprism
chart_metadata.description: AI-powered app for browsing, organizing & sharing your photo collection.

runAsContext.description: Photoprism run as a root user.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Photoprism is able to chown files.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Photoprism is able to bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: Photoprism is able to bypass permission checks.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Photoprism is able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Photoprism is able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: KILL
capabilities.description: Photoprism is able to kill processes.

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Photoprism

groups.name: Advanced Pod Configuration
groups.description: Configure Advanced Pod Options for Photoprism

attrs.label: Public
attrs.description:
Enable public access to Photoprism.</br>
If enabled, Photoprism will be accessible without authentication.

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description:
Set a password for Photoprism.</br>
If public access is enabled, a password is required.

attrs.label: Additional Environment Variables
attrs.description: Configure additional environment variables for Photoprism.

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Photoprism files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Photoprism files will be owned by.

attrs.label: WebUI Port
attrs.description: The port for Photoprism WebUI

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

attrs.label: Photoprism Import Storage
attrs.description: The path to store Photoprism Import.

attrs.label: Type
attrs.description:
ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

attrs.description: The configuration for the ixVolume dataset.

attrs.label: Enable ACL
attrs.description: Enable ACL for the dataset.

attrs.description: The name of the dataset to use for storage.

attrs.description: Path to perform ACL

attrs.description: Make sure to check the ID value is correct and aligns with RunAs user context of the application

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>

SMB Share: Is a SMB share that is mounted to a persistent volume claim.

ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)
SMB Share (Mounts a persistent volume claim to a SMB share)

attrs.label: Size (in Gi)
attrs.description: The size of the volume quota.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for Photoprism.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for Photoprism.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

2.0.0.app_readme:
PhotoPrism

PhotoPrism is a server-based application for browsing, organizing and sharing your personal photo collection.
2.0.0.detailed_readme:
PhotoPrism

PhotoPrism is a server-based application for browsing, organizing and sharing your personal photo collection.
